p: EPM is used to examine anxiolytic activity. The apparatus consists of two open and closed arms. In a face to face position and arms were elevated at a certain height of 40 cm. All treatments were made 30 min before being placed on the animal on the central base of EPM. For a period of 5m, the number of entries in the open arm (NEOA) and time of permanence in the open arm (TPOA) were recorded ( Oliveira Júnior et al., 2018).
